TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoggerDescription extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains information about a logger as a collection of values that can be used to instantiate the logger and can be serialized to be passed between different processes.

MemberSignature.Value: public LoggerDescription (string loggerClassName, string loggerAssemblyName, string loggerAssemblyFile, string loggerSwitchParameters, Microsoft.Build.Framework.LoggerVerbosity verbosity);

Docs.summary: Creates a logger description from the given data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger CreateLogger() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Creates an ILogger instance from the data in this description.
Docs.returns: An ILogger instance from the data in this description.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method may throw a variety of reflection exceptions if the data is invalid. It is the resposibility of the caller to handle these exceptions if desired.

Docs.summary: Gets the string of logger parameters.
Docs.value: The string of logger parameters, or if there are no parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Verbosity As LoggerVerbosity

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Returns the verbosity level for this logger.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For command line display, all loggers get the same verbosity level.
